programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two movie producers who owe money to the Mob set up their aging star actor for an insurance scam to try and save themselves, but they wind up getting more than they ever imagined. programme.title: The Family
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Robert De Niro, Michelle Pfeiffer and Tommy Lee Jones. A mobster and his family are relocated to Normandy, France, as part of a witness protection programme. programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: Catherine "Kya" Clark is a young woman who fends for herself in the Deep South. Chase Andrews courts her in opposition to his mother, but when he is found dead, the finger of suspicion points at Kya, so lawyer Tom Milton mounts a robust defence. programme.title: Frida
programme.desc: Award-winning biographical drama starring Salma Hayek. programme.title: The Unlikely Pilgrimage of Harold Fry
programme.desc: Devon-based pensioner Harold Fry receives a letter from his dying former work colleague, Queenie. She is living out her final few days in a Northumberland hospice. programme.title: Mrs Harris Goes To Paris

programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. During a bank heist, Danny discovers a photo of his daughter with an instruction to find someone called Dell Rayne. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. programme.title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Family, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. A failed prom proposal culminates in Ruby plunging into the sea, and finally she discovers she is destined to inherit the throne from her kraken grandmother. programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller directed by John Woo and based on a short story by Philip K Dick, starring Ben Affleck, Aaron Eckhart and Uma Thurman. programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Japanese Grand Prix starts here. Ahead of the McLarens, Max Verstappen returned to his imperious best to lock in pole. His Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez starts from P5. (24.09).

programme.title: Qatar F1 Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 Qatar Grand Prix sees the fourth F1 Sprint of the season. Oscar Piastri starts from P1. (07.10).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Lusail welcomes F1 racing once more. George Russell and Lewis Hamilton follow the newly crowned world champion Max Verstappen. (08.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind. (21.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: After taking Sprint victory, Max Verstappen starts from sixth for the 2023 United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc and Lando Norris are on the front row with Lewis Hamilton third. (22.10).

programme.title: Mexico City F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's race day at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Taking place at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Charles Leclerc starts in pole with his Ferrari teammate Carlos Sainz in second. (29.10).

programme.title: Sao Paulo F1 Sprint
programme.desc: The Sao Paulo Grand Prix sees the final F1 Sprint this season. Lando Norris starts from P1 to make up for a disappointing Friday, while Verstappen and Perez complete the top three. (04.11).

programme.title: Sao Paulo F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: On race day at Interlagos, it's lights out for the Sao Paulo Grand Prix. Yesterday's Sprint winner Max Verstappen starts from pole and is joined by Charles Leclerc on the front row. (05.11).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: It's lights out at the Las Vegas Grand Prix. Set against one of the most vibrant backdrops F1 has ever seen, it was Charles Leclerc who lit up qualifying to put his Ferrari on pole. (18.11).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: For the final time this year, Formula 1 goes racing as Yas Marina Circuit stages the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. Will Max Verstappen bookend a record-breaking season with a 19th race win? (26.11).

programme.title: Ferrari Challenge Highlights
programme.desc: Revisit a thrilling weekend at the Ferrari Racing Days in Abu Dhabi where winners were crowned in the Trofeo Pirelli and Coppa Shell Winter Challenge.

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: In a year of F1 that sees more races than ever before, the ride begins with the 2023 Bahrain Grand Prix. Max Verstappen is joined by Sergio Perez in a Red Bull front-row lockout. (05.03).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On the front row, pole-sitter Sergio Perez is joined by Fernando Alonso as George Russell completes the top three for the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix. Max Verstappen starts from P15. (19.03).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On Sunday at Albert Park, Max Verstappen has pole with George Russell joining the world champion on the front row for the 2023 Australian Grand Prix. Lewis Hamilton starts in third. (02.04).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The Azerbaijan Grand Prix sees the first of six F1 Sprints. With Ferrari's Charles Leclerc on pole in a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag. (29.04).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Azerbaijan Grand Prix has arrived as Baku prepares for 51 laps of high-octane racing. Charles Leclerc's immense one-lap pace in Friday's qualifying secured Ferrari pole. (30.04).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The wait is over - it's Formula 1 race day at the Miami International Autodrome in Florida. Sergio Perez starts on pole with Fernando Alonso also on the front row. (07.05).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On the streets of Monte Carlo, the one-of-a-kind Monaco Grand Prix arrives, as Max Verstappen has pole ahead of Fernando Alonso. Esteban Ocon starts in P3 with Lewis Hamilton in P5. (28.05).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Max Verstappen has pole at the 2023 Spanish Grand Prix, while home favourite Carlos Sainz joins the Dutchman at the front. Lando Norris and Lewis Hamilton make up the second row. (04.06).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: At the 2023 Canadian Grand Prix, Max Verstappen mastered the wet to secure pole position with Fernando Alonso and Lewis Hamilton both on the hunt in second and third respectively. (18.06).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Austrian Grand Prix sees the second of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag for a haul of championship points. (01.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The Red Bull Ring in Spielberg is the venue for the 2023 Austrian Grand Prix. Last season, Charles Leclerc denied Max Verstappen to take P1 in Red Bull's backyard. (02.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: It's lights out at Silverstone as the 2023 British Grand Prix gets underway. Another superb Spielberg performance sees the Dutchman Max Verstappen carry all the momentum here. (09.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Rekindling memories of an unforgettable 2021 season, Lewis Hamilton has pole position with Max Verstappen joining the Mercedes man on the front row at the 2023 Hungarian Grand Prix. (23.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Belgian Grand Prix sees the third of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag for a haul of championship points. (29.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Known as the Temple of Speed, Monza sets the stage for the 2023 Italian Grand Prix - the same stage Max Verstappen topped just a year ago. (03.09).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Among the most physically demanding races on the calendar - this is the Singapore Grand Prix. Carlos Sainz starts from pole position and George Russell joins him on the front row. (17.09).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Japanese Grand Prix starts here. Ahead of the McLarens, Max Verstappen returned to his imperious best to lock in pole. His Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez starts from P5. (24.09).

programme.title: Qatar F1 Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 Qatar Grand Prix sees the fourth F1 Sprint of the season. Oscar Piastri starts from P1. (07.10).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Lusail welcomes F1 racing once more. George Russell and Lewis Hamilton follow the newly crowned world champion Max Verstappen. (08.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind. (21.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: After taking Sprint victory, Max Verstappen starts from sixth for the 2023 United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc and Lando Norris are on the front row with Lewis Hamilton third. (22.10).

programme.title: Mexico City F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's race day at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Taking place at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Charles Leclerc starts in pole with his Ferrari teammate Carlos Sainz in second. (29.10).

programme.title: Sao Paulo F1 Sprint
programme.desc: The Sao Paulo Grand Prix sees the final F1 Sprint this season. Lando Norris starts from P1 to make up for a disappointing Friday, while Verstappen and Perez complete the top three. (04.11).

programme.title: Sao Paulo F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: On race day at Interlagos, it's lights out for the Sao Paulo Grand Prix. Yesterday's Sprint winner Max Verstappen starts from pole and is joined by Charles Leclerc on the front row. (05.11).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: It's lights out at the Las Vegas Grand Prix. Set against one of the most vibrant backdrops F1 has ever seen, it was Charles Leclerc who lit up qualifying to put his Ferrari on pole. (18.11).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: For the final time this year, Formula 1 goes racing as Yas Marina Circuit stages the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. Will Max Verstappen bookend a record-breaking season with a 19th race win? (26.11).

programme.title: The Home of Formula One
programme.desc: A look back at the best stories and features from the 2023 Singapore Grand Prix with Sky's Formula 1 presenters.
